con:part.con:content: <definitions name="SearchAndSortService" targetNamespace="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/searchandsortservice/interfaces" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/searchandsortservice/interfaces" xmlns:common="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/commonservice/interfaces"> <types> <xs:schema> <xs:import namespace="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/searchandsortservice/interfaces" schemaLocation="../schemas/searchAndSort.xsd"/> </xs:schema> <xs:schema> <xs:import namespace="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/commonservice/interfaces" schemaLocation="../../../../../commonService/src/main/resources/schemas/common.xsd"/> </xs:schema> </types> <message name="faultMsg"> <part name="params" element="common:faultMessage"/> </message> <message name="validationWithSearchByNameRequestMsg"> <part name="params" element="tns:validationWithSearchByNameRequest"/> </message> <message name="validationWithSearchByNameResponseMsg"> <part name="params" element="tns:validationWithSearchByNameResponse"/> </message> <message name="validationWithSearchByCategoryRequestMsg"> <part name="params" element="tns:validationWithSearchByCategoryRequest"/> </message> <message name="validationWithSearchByCategoryResponseMsg"> <part name="params" element="tns:validationWithSearchByCategoryResponse"/> </message> <message name="validationWithSearchByContactRequestMsg"> <part name="params" element="tns:validationWithSearchByContactRequest"/> </message> <message name="validationWithSearchByContactResponseMsg"> <part name="params" element="tns:validationWithSearchByContactResponse"/> </message> <portType name="SearchAndSortServicePort"> <operation name="searchByNameWithValidation"> <input message="tns:validationWithSearchByNameRequestMsg"/> <output message="tns:validationWithSearchByNameResponseMsg"/> <fault name="faultMsg" message="tns:faultMsg"/> </operation> <operation name="searchByCategoryWithValidation"> <input message="tns:validationWithSearchByCategoryRequestMsg"/> <output message="tns:validationWithSearchByContactResponseMsg"/> <fault name="faultMsg" message="tns:faultMsg"/> </operation> <operation name="searchByContactWithValidation"> <input message="tns:validationWithSearchByContactRequestMsg"/> <output message="tns:validationWithSearchByContactResponseMsg"/> <fault name="faultMsg" message="tns:faultMsg"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="searchAndSortServiceSOAPBinding" type="tns:SearchAndSortServicePort"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="searchByNameWithValidation"> <soap:operation soapAction="searchByNameWithValidation"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> <fault name="fault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </fault> </operation> <operation name="searchByCategoryWithValidation"> <soap:operation soapAction="searchByCategoryWithValidation"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> <fault name="fault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </fault> </operation> <operation name="searchByContactWithValidation"> <soap:operation soapAction="searchByContactWithValidation"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> <fault name="fault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </fault> </operation> </binding> <service name="SessionValidatorService"> <port name="SessionValidatorServicePort" binding="tns:searchAndSortServiceSOAPBinding"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8085/oscs/searchAndSortServices"/> </port> </service> </definitions>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/searchandsortservice/interfaces" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/searchandsortservice/interfaces" xmlns:common="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/commonservice/interfaces" xmlns:contact="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/citizencontactservice/interfaces" xmlns:session="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/sessionvalidatorservice/interfaces"> <xs:import namespace="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/commonservice/interfaces" schemaLocation="../../../../../commonService/src/main/resources/schemas/common.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/sessionvalidatorservice/interfaces" schemaLocation="../../../../../sessionValidatorService/src/main/resources/schemas/sessionValidator.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/citizencontactservice/interfaces" schemaLocation="../../../../../citizenContactService/src/main/resources/schemas/citizenContact.xsd"/> <xs:element name="validationWithSearchByNameRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="sessionDetails" type="session:sessionValidatorDetails"/> <xs:element name="searchByNameDetails" type="contact:searchByNameDetails"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="validationWithSearchByNameResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="searchResults" type="contact:contactList"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="validationWithSearchByCategoryRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="sessionDetails" type="session:sessionValidatorDetails"/> <xs:element name="searchByCategoryDetails" type="contact:searchByCategoryDetails"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="validationWithSearchByCategoryResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="searchResults" type="contact:contactList"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="validationWithSearchByContactRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="sessionDetails" type="session:sessionValidatorDetails"/> <xs:element name="searchByContactDetails" type="contact:searchByContactDetails"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="validationWithSearchByContactResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="searchResults" type="contact:contactList"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/commonservice/interfaces" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/commonservice/interfaces"> <xs:element name="faultMessage"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="message" type="tns:message"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="serviceStatus"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="status" type="tns:status"/> <xs:element name="code" type="tns:code"/> <xs:element name="message" type="tns:message"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:simpleType name="status"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="OK"/> <xs:enumeration value="CREATED"/> <xs:enumeration value="NO CONTENT"/> <xs:enumeration value="UPDATED"/> <xs:enumeration value="DELETED"/> <xs:enumeration value="FAILED"/> <xs:enumeration value="AUTHENTICATION_FAILED"/> <xs:enumeration value="AUTHENTICATION_SUCCESSFUL"/> <xs:enumeration value="SQL_QUERY_FAILURE"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="code"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="RC: 200"/> <xs:enumeration value="RC: 201"/> <xs:enumeration value="RC: 204"/> <xs:enumeration value="RC: 400"/> <xs:enumeration value="RC: 450"/> <xs:enumeration value="RC: 498"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="message"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully added a new user!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Failed to add a user!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully fetched the user details!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully fetched the list of user details!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Failed to fetch the list of user details!"/> <xs:enumeration value="No user found!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully updated the user!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Failed to update the user!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully deleted the user details!"/> <xs:enumeration value="No user found to be deleted!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully added a new contact!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Failed to add a contact!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully fetched the contact details!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully fetched the list of contact details!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Failed to fetch the list of contact details!"/> <xs:enumeration value="No contact found!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully updated the contact!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Failed to update the contact!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully deleted the contact details!"/> <xs:enumeration value="No contact found to be deleted!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Email not found!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Mobile number not found!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Incorrect password!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully logged in!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully logged out!"/> <xs:enumeration value="No user found to log out!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully validated the user session!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Invalid user session!"/> <xs:enumeration value="No match Found!"/> <xs:enumeration value="Successfully fetched the search results!"/> <xs:enumeration value="SQL Query Fault!"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/sessionvalidatorservice/interfaces" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/sessionvalidatorservice/interfaces" xmlns:common="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/commonservice/interfaces" xmlns:user="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/userservice/interfaces"> <xs:import namespace="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/commonservice/interfaces" schemaLocation="../../../../../commonService/src/main/resources/schemas/common.xsd"/> <xs:import namespace="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/userservice/interfaces" schemaLocation="../../../../../userService/src/main/resources/schemas/user.xsd"/> <xs:complexType name="sessionValidatorDetails"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="uid" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element name="sessionToken" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="evaluateSessionRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="sessionValidatorDetails" type="tns:sessionValidatorDetails"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="evaluateSessionResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="userDetails" type="user:userDetails"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/userservice/interfaces" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/userservice/interfaces" xmlns:common="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/commonservice/interfaces"> <xs:import namespace="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/commonservice/interfaces" schemaLocation="../../../../../commonService/src/main/resources/schemas/common.xsd"/> <xs:complexType name="userDetails"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="uid" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="address" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="email" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="mobileNo" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="password" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="userWithSessionDetails"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="uid" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="address" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="email" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="mobileNo" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="password" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="sessionToken" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="expiryDate" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="userWithSessionDetails" type="tns:userWithSessionDetails"/> <xs:complexType name="userList"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="users" type="tns:userDetails" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="loginWithEmailDetails"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="email" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="password" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="loginWithMobileNoDetails"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="mobileNo" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="password" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="addUserRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="userDetails" type="tns:userDetails"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="addUserResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="userDetails" type="tns:userDetails"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getUserRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="uid" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getUserResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="userDetails" type="tns:userDetails"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getUserWithSessionDetailsRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="uid" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getUserWithSessionDetailsResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="userWithSessionDetails" type="tns:userWithSessionDetails"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getAllUsersRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence></xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getAllUsersResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="userList" type="tns:userList"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="updateUserRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="userDetails" type="tns:userDetails"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="updateUserResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="userDetails" type="tns:userDetails"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="deleteUserRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="uid" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="deleteUserResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="userDetails" type="tns:userDetails"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="loginWithEmailRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="loginWithEmailDetails" type="tns:loginWithEmailDetails"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="loginWithEmailResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="userWithSessionDetails" type="tns:userWithSessionDetails"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="loginWithMobileNoRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="loginWithMobileNoDetails" type="tns:loginWithMobileNoDetails"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="loginWithMobileNoResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="userWithSessionDetails" type="tns:userWithSessionDetails"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="logOutRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="uid" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="logOutResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="userDetails" type="tns:userDetails"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/citizencontactservice/interfaces" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/citizencontactservice/interfaces" xmlns:common="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/commonservice/interfaces"> <xs:import namespace="http://iit.du.ac.bd/onestopcitizenservice/commonservice/interfaces" schemaLocation="../../../../../commonService/src/main/resources/schemas/common.xsd"/> <xs:simpleType name="category"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Education"/> <xs:enumeration value="Environment"/> <xs:enumeration value="Health"/> <xs:enumeration value="Miscellaneous"/> <xs:enumeration value="National"/> <xs:enumeration value="Security"/> <xs:enumeration value="Woman and child"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="contactDetails"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="uid" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="category" type="tns:category"/> <xs:element name="contactNo" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="contactList"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="contacts" type="tns:contactDetails" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="sortOrder"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Ascending"/> <xs:enumeration value="Descending"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="columnToBeSorted"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Name"/> <xs:enumeration value="Category"/> <xs:enumeration value="Contact No"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="searchByNameDetails"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="columnToBeSorted" type="tns:columnToBeSorted"/> <xs:element name="sortOrder" type="tns:sortOrder"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="searchByCategoryDetails"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="category" type="tns:category"/> <xs:element name="columnToBeSorted" type="tns:columnToBeSorted"/> <xs:element name="sortOrder" type="tns:sortOrder"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="searchByContactDetails"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="contact" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="columnToBeSorted" type="tns:columnToBeSorted"/> <xs:element name="sortOrder" type="tns:sortOrder"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="addContactRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="contactDetails" type="tns:contactDetails"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="addContactResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="contactDetails" type="tns:contactDetails"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getContactRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="uid" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getContactResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="contactDetails" type="tns:contactDetails"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getAllContactsRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence></xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="getAllContactsResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="contactList" type="tns:contactList"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="updateContactRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="contactDetails" type="tns:contactDetails"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="updateContactResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="contactDetails" type="tns:contactDetails"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="deleteContactRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="uid" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="deleteContactResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="contactDetails" type="tns:contactDetails"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="searchByNameRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="searchByNameDetails" type="tns:searchByNameDetails"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="searchByNameResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="contactList" type="tns:contactList"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="searchByCategoryRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="searchByCategoryDetails" type="tns:searchByCategoryDetails"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="searchByCategoryResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="contactList" type="tns:contactList"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="searchByContactRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="searchByContactDetails" type="tns:searchByContactDetails"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="searchByContactResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="contactList" type="tns:contactList"/> <xs:element ref="common:serviceStatus"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:schema>
